docs.title: Software Engineering Mathematics
docs.text: A comprehensive, university-level mathematics curriculum designed specifically for software engineering students.

docs.title: What this site contains
docs.text:
• Core mathematical foundations
  • Computer science mathematics
  • Advanced and specialized topics
  • Practice problems for every topic

docs.title: How to use this site
docs.text:
• Read lecture notes topic by topic
  • Solve the practice problems
  • Extend with your own examples or solutions

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: These are university-level lecture notes designed for software engineering students. Each topic includes conceptual explanations and practice problems.
